projects.title: Star Wars Character Search
projects.description: This app was built with React functional components, and styling was done using React-Bootstrap. Axios is used to request data from the swapi.dev Star Wars API.  I implemented a basic caching system that saves the responses for API calls for 72 hours.

projects.title: Expense Tracker App
projects.description: This is a basic expense-tracking app using local storage for persistence. In a production scenario, a database with authentication would be used instead.  The project was written in JavaScript using React. Bootstrap was used for styling. I enjoyed making the layout mobile-friendly and responsive to various screen sizes.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: Let's go back in time and play some Snake! The classic game written in vanilla JavaScript, it includes a multicolored snake, tracking of high scores, and four (4!) difficulty levels to keep you challenged during your Zoom calls. I wrote another version of this game in Python. It's a fun coding challenge.
